metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: SQL is the standard language for dealing with Relational Databases.
content.html: SQL is the standard language for dealing with Relational Databases.

content.text: SQL is used to insert, search, update, and delete database records.
content.html: SQL is used to insert, search, update, and delete database records.

content.text: The following SQL statement selects all the records in the "Customers" table:
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all the records in the "Customers" table:

content.code_html: SELECT * FROM Customers;

content.text: In this tutorial we will write all SQL keywords in upper-case.
content.html: In this tutorial we will write all SQL keywords in upper-case.

content.text: Some database systems require a semicolon at the end of each SQL statement.
content.html: Some database systems require a semicolon at the end of each SQL statement.

content.text: Semicolon is the standard way to separate each SQL statement in database systems that allow more than one SQL statement to be executed in the same call to the server.
content.html: Semicolon is the standard way to separate each SQL statement in database systems that allow more than one SQL statement to be executed in the same call to the server.

content.text: In this tutorial, we will use semicolon at the end of each SQL statement.
content.html: In this tutorial, we will use semicolon at the end of each SQL statement.
